This is a fun game! I've played it through a couple of times and keep coming back to it. A great example of "casual" gaming, it can be played from 1 minute to . . . Nicely Done.
Game crashes consistently in level 12.  I am running on an iPhone 6, iOS version 9.3. Big you fix this I'll raise my review to five stars :)
Super fun. Glad they finally made another bunch of levels.
Fascinating and exciting game. One of the best I've experienced.
Absolutely love this game and it's soundtrack.
I love this game. please add more level to this game.
Thanks for the port!!!
A tri-dimenionsonal cube game with fascinating variations, intelligent and challenging, but not frustratingly hard.

I want to love this game. I just kind of like it as it is now. I've worked to get S+ ranks on the 7 levels I've beaten so far, but I have to say my number one obstacle isn't the game, it's the controls! The swipe controls are garbage, the four corner controls are inconsistent, which leaves the D-pad controls. They're the best option available, but the arrows are too close together! Please update to allow customizing the D-pad arrow position and size. With that improvement, I can play again. Without it, this game is unnecessarily frustrating and my time is better spent elsewhere.
If both control methods weren't so frustrating it could have been a nice game. I know iPhone has not hardware button but this "cubic inertia" isn't fun at all...

title.label: Simple fun in a 3D virtual space.

content.label: Nice simple game for a quick fix. Controls a little finicky but overall an enjoyable game.
Me surpreendi com a jogabilidade, beleza e genialidade deste jogo, parabéns aos desenvolvedores!

Fun game to play! It has cool illusions and good challenges

I love this game. Just beat the main levels and the last few are challenging to say the least! Love the concept, design and gameplay!
The game is very clever and good looking, controls are good. Can't stop playing!!
Nice!

You’re a cube that rolls around a world of right angles. The makers of this game take that simple premise and develop it in creative and surprising ways over 48+ levels. This game looks beautiful and controls great (though I did not use the default controls – try both to see what works for you). There’s some replay value (you can race to beat your old times and collect everything), but  I wasn’t compelled to play again (I’m not a completist I guess). Overall an excellent, beautiful game.
Iz da sheet

Mobigames puts out some of the most inventive, beautifully crafted, yet simple to understand games ever. Whenever I purchase a game, it needs to grab me quick, addictive game play, and lots of challenging levels...Mobigames never disappoints.

I immediately loved this game. Within 1 minute this became my all time favorite game. I hope this company continues to keep putting out more Edge games. Make this a trilogy. Fans will purchase. Awesome colors and atmosphere. Tip: when you reach The Final Clash switch your controls to the D Pad or you'll never beat it. Your cube is much faster when you change to pushing the arrow keys.

I loved every glorious moment of Edge. This expansion goes beyond the expected, providing not just more of the original's sublime gaming charm, but also infusing the experience with a veritable bounty of new ideas guaranteed to surprise and amuse. A delicious treat, for which I am genuinely grateful!
Near perfection! Where is the soundtrack???!!!!!!!

Rolling a cube over, around and thru obstacles and hazards that morph in ways helpful or not, while an opponent cube makes mischief.  You get lots of levels, each with something unique to master.  Rather than simply completing a level, your performance is rated for completion time, number of deaths, and objects collected.  So, improving your scores on each level becomes another objective of the game.  An optional "ghost" suggests courses to take; or does it?  Best puzzle/skill game I've played this year.
I first played this game in my class, and when I got home I automatically got it! I recommend this app! You should get it, You won't regret It!!! 😊😃
This game has got style to spare, and you definitely get a lot of bang for your buck. If you're a fan of Cuboid, then you're in for a real treat with this one!
Trippy and cool game

title.label: Too little content, higher levels bloody-minded

content.label: This is a great game engine marred by too many tediously nasty levels (and the very annoying hanging mechanic). The problem is that the playful levels are done easily, which just gets me stuck on the hard levels forever.
With catching music, catching game play and so on and so on, it is the one of the funnest app ever!!!

This game has a lot going for it. The music fits the game perfectly and really expresses the personality of a moving, self aware, cube very well =). Not only was the game enjoyable and clever but it had enough challenging levels to keep me motivated to get an A grade or better. This game has a retro game feel in its simplicity yet it has small things like a competitive and evil black cube that makes you feel more invested in the fate and performance of your cube. Overall I give it 5 stars.
Great puzzle game. Excellent music. Must have.
